body:
故事劇情都很棒
果然以前的漫畫都很精彩！！！

The characters are good, the expression on each girl look are good and it has long story, i like this kind of manga just one thing missing in this manga...no man! no mind break, no netorare, no cheating, no blackmail, no corruption, its supposed a good one and it should be rate 5/5 but i think 3.5/5 are good enough. Keep it up, if you have something more like this i would like to see it :D
